synopsis.text: While navigating the challenges of high school, Reki, a dedicated skateboarder, finds solace in the clandestine and perilous downhill skateboarding race known as 'S.' Held in the depths of an abandoned mine, 'S' attracts daring skaters who thrive on the adrenaline-fueled confrontations that unfold during these races. After a devastating loss leaves Reki with a broken arm and a destroyed skateboard, he encounters Langa, a transfer student from Canada with no skateboarding experience but a hidden talent. As they delve deeper into the thrilling world of 'S,' Langa's unexpected abilities may just turn the tide in the most unforeseen way. Prepare for a gripping tale of skateboarding rivalries and boundless possibilities in this exciting anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
